stimulusHtml: Which of the following can replace  /* missing code */  to produce this result?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

ArrayList<String> oldList = new ArrayList<String>();
oldList.add("a");
oldList.add("b");
oldList.add("c");

ArrayList<String> newList = new ArrayList<String>();

/* missing code */

 

After executing this code segment,  newList  should contain  ["c", "b", "a", "a", "b", "c"].

choicesHtml:
for (String s : oldList)
{
   newList.add(s);
   newList.add(0, s); 
}

for (int j = 0; j < oldList.size(); j++)
{
   newList.add(oldList.get(0));
   newList.add(oldList.get(j)); 
}

for (int j = 0; j < oldList.size(); j++)
{
   newList.add(j, oldList.get(j));
   newList.add(0, oldList.get(j)); 
}
